name: Santa's snowman (Ace Productions)
description:
Santa's Snowman is a simple Christmas game.

Santa's sleigh has crashed and now all the presents are lost, scattered all over and in some dangerous places too. These presents will need to be collected so Santa can deliver them. The only man for the job? Santa's snowman! Play as a running, jumping, snowball-tossing snowman as he navigates obstacles to gather every last gift. Will you help save Christmas?

See the game being made :
